parts.text: {"word":"absurd","priority":"★★☆","meanings":[{"part_of_speech":"adjective","definition":"不合理な、ばかげた、馬鹿げた、不条理な","english_definition":"wildly unreasonable, illogical, or inappropriate; ridiculously unreasonable, unsound, or incongruous.","examples":[{"sentence":"The idea is utterly absurd.","translation":"その考えは全くばかげている。"},{"sentence":"It sounds absurd, but it's true.","translation":"ばかげているように聞こえるかもしれないが、本当だ。"},{"sentence":"It's absurd to blame him for everything.","translation":"彼を全てのことで責めるのは不合理だ。"},{"sentence":"The situation was becoming increasingly absurd.","translation":"状況はますます不条理になってきていた。"}],"collocations":["utterly absurd (全くばかげた)","patently absurd (明白にばかげた)","highly absurd (非常にばかげた)","absurd situation (不条理な状況)","absurd idea (ばかげた考え)","absurd claim (ばかげた主張)","absurd to do something (～するのはばかげている)"],"synonyms":["ridiculous","ludicrous","preposterous","nonsensical","foolish","silly","irrational","illogical","inane","farcical","crazy","unreasonable","outlandish","bizarre","grotesque","incongruous","inappropriate","incoherent","meaningless","senseless","pointless","futile","paradoxical","self-contradictory","inconsistent","anomalous","deviant","eccentric","untenable","unsupportable","implausible","far-fetched","fantastic","extravagant","outrageous","monstrous","shocking","scandalous","unthinkable","unbelievable","incredible","impossible","surreal","nightmarish","Kafkaesque","Orwellian"],"antonyms":["reasonable","logical","sensible","rational","sound","wise","appropriate","fitting","suitable","consistent","coherent","meaningful","significant","important","relevant","plausible","believable","credible","realistic","practical","pragmatic","feasible","viable","workable","tenable","supportable","justifiable","defensible","explicable","understandable","comprehensible","intelligible","legitimate","valid","authentic","genuine","sincere","earnest","serious","grave","solemn","somber","austere","stark","grim","tragic","pathetic","poignant","touching","moving","heartbreaking","devastating","catastrophic","apocalyptic","cosmic","universal","eternal","infinite","absolute","ultimate","transcendent","divine","sacred","holy","blessed","revered","venerated","worshiped","adored","cherished","prized","valued","esteemed","respected","admired","lauded","praised","extolled","glorified","deified","immortalized","canonized","sanctified","beatified","enlightened","awakened","liberated","emancipated","freed","redeemed","saved","resurrected","reborn","transformed","mutated","evolved","ascended","transcended","sublimated","purified","cleansed","refined","exalted","elevated","ennobled","dignified","honored","venerated","worshiped","adored","cherished","prized","valued","esteemed","respected","admired","lauded","praised","extolled","glorified","deified","immortalized","canonized","sanctified","beatified","enlightened","awakened","liberated","emancipated","freed","redeemed","saved","resurrected","reborn","transformed","mutated","evolved","ascended","transcended","sublimated","purified","cleansed","refined","exalted","elevated","ennobled","dignified","honored"]},{"part_of_speech":"noun","definition":"不条理、ばかげたこと","english_definition":"the quality or state of being absurd; something absurd.","examples":[{"sentence":"The absurdity of the situation struck me.","translation":"その状況の不条理さが私を打った。"},{"sentence":"He was laughing at the absurdity of it all.","translation":"彼はその全てがばかげていることに笑っていた。"},{"sentence":"The play explores the absurdity of human existence.","translation":"その劇は人間の存在の不条理を探求している。"}],"collocations":["the absurdity of something (～の不条理)","sense of absurdity (不条理感)","laugh at the absurdity (不条理を笑う)","embrace the absurdity (不条理を受け入れる)","explore the absurdity (不条理を探求する)","highlight the absurdity (不条理を強調する)","point out the absurdity (不条理を指摘する)"],"synonyms":["irrationality","illogicality","nonsense","folly","silliness","farcicality","inanity","incongruity","inappropriateness","incoherence","meaninglessness","senselessness","pointlessness","futility","paradox","self-contradiction","inconsistency","anomaly","deviation","eccentricity","untenability","implausibility","extravagance","outrageousness","monstrosity","shockingness","scandalousness","unthinkability","impossibility","surreality","nightmare","Kafkaesque","Orwellian"],"antonyms":["reasonableness","logic","sense","rationality","wisdom","appropriateness","suitability","consistency","coherence","meaningfulness","significance","importance","relevance","plausibility","believability","credibility","realism","practicality","pragmatism","feasibility","viability","workability","tenability","justifiability","explicability","understandability","legitimacy","validity","authenticity","genuineness","sincerity","earnestness","seriousness","gravity","solemnity","somberness","austerity","starkness","grimness","tragedy","pathos","poignancy","tenderness","compassion","empathy","sympathy","understanding","forgiveness","mercy","grace","compassion","charity","benevolence","altruism","humanity","kindness","gentleness","tenderness","care","concern","consideration","thoughtfulness","sensitivity","tact","diplomacy","discretion","prudence","caution","circumspection","foresight","wisdom","insight","understanding","knowledge","intelligence","reason","logic","rationality","sanity","soundness","health","well-being","happiness","joy","peace","contentment","satisfaction","fulfillment","purpose","meaning","significance","value","worth","importance","relevance","pertinence","applicability","utility","usefulness","practicality","feasibility","viability","workability","tenability","justifiability","defensibility","explicability","understandability","legitimacy","validity","authenticity","genuineness","sincerity","earnestness","seriousness","gravity","solemnity","somberness","au
